lead_paragraph: Retail price wars online have entered a new era of speed and precision, creating a confusing landscape for shoppers in which prices leap and plummet on short notice. Now, sophisticated computer programs accomplish the same goal online within hours, and even minutes, Stephanie Clifford reports in The New York Times. Read more »

headline.main: Retail Frenzy: Prices on the Web Change Hourly
